## R programming


:::: {.callout-note}
## Materials

1. Download R and RStudio: To get started, install both R and RStudio:

    - [Download R](https://cran.r-project.org/)
    - [Download RStudio Desktop](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)
    - Make sure to select the version that matches your operating system (Windows, macOS, or Linux).

2. To help you install R and RStudio smoothly, watch one of the following tutorial videos below.

    - [How to Install R and RStudio on Windows 11](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H9EBlFDGG4k)
    - [Download and Install R and R Studio in Simple Steps](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tb3R4GLJ45U)
    - [How to Install R and RStudio on Windows 10/11 [2024]](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9SzKJH93t5o)
    - [Installing R and R Studio | R for Data Analytics Series](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TsnGd6p9oTk&vl=en)
    - [How to download and install R and RStudio](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=TFGYlKvQEQ4&t=14s)
    - [Install R and R Studio | Learn R](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tgPuB-iNww0)
